name: dpgs
description: JSON schema validation for Digital Public Goods nominees

scripts.lint: for f in ./nominees/*.json; do jsonlint "$f" > tempfile.tmp; truncate -s -1 tempfile.tmp; if diff $f tempfile.tmp; then echo "Linting of $f passed"; else echo "Linting of $f failed" && exit 1; fi; done
scripts.lint:fix: for f in ./nominees/*.json; do echo $f; jsonlint "$f" -i; done

hooks.pre-commit: npm test && npm run order && npm run check
